data.eml:eml: A Revision of North American Lactura (Lepidoptera, Zygaenoidea, Lacturidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Matson, Tanner A., Wagner, David L., Miller, Scott E. (2019): A Revision of North American Lactura (Lepidoptera, Zygaenoidea, Lacturidae). ZooKeys 846: 75-116, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.846.31953, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.846.31953
